https://paininthearsenal.com/2018/04/03/arsenal-wilfred-ndidi-transfer-like-francis-coquelin/

But that ball-winner needs to do more than just win the ball, he needs to understand how to turn play and go in the opposite direction.

Which is something Francis Coquelin never learned to do, despite years of investment into his continued development.

Max Meyer is my front runner, and not just because he’s free. He’s my front runner to fill a role, despite the fact that he isn’t as good as a ball-winner than some others, but it’s what he brings go forward that counts.

That said, you can invest in building midfield options. I do miss the security that Coquelin brought, when you could turn to him to guard a late lead. That was something special and reassuring that we don’t have anymore.

That’s where Wilfred Ndidi comes into it. Just 21 years old, Ndidi knows how to win the ball. 4.2 tackles won this year. That’s damn good, but it’s a specialty thing. He doesn’t do much else, despite his solid three assists.

【now.com體育】周四歐霸盃4強首回合，阿仙奴主場迎戰馬德里體育會，兵工廠收到喜訊，那就是對方射手迪亞高哥斯達因傷缺陣。

馬體會前鋒主帥施蒙尼透露，射手迪亞高哥斯達（Diego Costa）因傷不會在周四披甲：「軍醫告訴我們，別預期哥斯達能夠在首回合披甲。」DC是於歐霸盃8強對士砵亭時腿筋受傷，即使目前已經復操，但首回合難以上陣。

消息指，該名西班牙國腳前鋒可望於次回合復出，但對兵工廠無疑已是一大利好消息。至於馬體會鋒線依然人強馬壯，基沙文、費蘭度托利斯、加美路甚至安祖哥利亞也可任正箭頭。

除了DC之外，馬體會在上場聯賽對貝迪斯時傷出的守將桑法蘭托里斯，證實拉傷左腳，未必趕及在首回合復出。

Viera interview 2001
其實以前啲球員講野仲痴線
其實都幾撚反骨下

https://www.theguardian.com/football/2001/jun/25/newsstory.sport2

Patrick Vieira has launched an amazing attack on his Arsenal team-mates and Arsene Wenger's summer signings - and made it clear that he wants to leave.

In an interview with the Sun this morning, Vieira also dismissed Arsenal's chances of success next season, claiming they wouldn't even finish in the top five of the Premiership.

He said: "People should know this is nothing to do with money. I need to leave because I want to win more trophies and I just cannot see that happening at Arsenal. Certainly not over the next few years, anyway.

"Comparing Arsenal to the big clubs in Europe this season is going to be quite ridiculous," he added.

"I do not honestly see Arsenal finishing in the top five in the league - and you can forget the Champions League."

In recent weeks, Arsene Wenger has signed Everton striker Francis Jeffers and Rangers midfielder Giovanni van Bronckhorst in an attempt to strengthen his squad and persuade Vieira to stay. However, Vieira sees nothing to be excited about in their arrival.

"When I told Arsene Wenger I was leaving, he said to me 'I have £25m to spend on a few players'. My answer was 'Obviously, Mr Wenger, you are not shopping in Harrods. That will only buy you one good player.' Now I have been proved right.

"Arsene Wenger has signed two 'hopeful' players who haven't proved themselves in the Premiership yet. One of them is a boy of 20.

"You can't compete with the best clubs in Europe by making these kind of signings.

"Arsene Wenger is an ambitious manager and he knows deep in his heart that he needs five world-class players to compete among the best in Europe.

£25m in the kitty, Arsenal is not a great European club. With that budget they won't even be among the top 20 clubs in Europe."

Fellow Frenchmen Robert Pires, Thierry Henry, Sylvain Wiltord and Gilles Grimandi have urged Vieira to remain at Highbury, but today he dismissed their pleas.

He declared: "I have given 100 per cent to Arsenal over the last five years. They have only been there for a year or so.

"They have won nothing with Arsenal. They should stay and try to win things for the club before they open their mouths.

"My message to these players is that they have their lives and I have mine."

https://www.theguardian.com/football/2001/jun/25/newsstory.sport2

Patrick Vieira has launched an amazing attack on his Arsenal team-mates and Arsene Wenger's summer signings - and made it clear that he wants to leave.

In an interview with the Sun this morning, Vieira also dismissed Arsenal's chances of success next season, claiming they wouldn't even finish in the top five of the Premiership.

He said: "People should know this is nothing to do with money. I need to leave because I want to win more trophies and I just cannot see that happening at Arsenal. Certainly not over the next few years, anyway.

"Comparing Arsenal to the big clubs in Europe this season is going to be quite ridiculous," he added.

"I do not honestly see Arsenal finishing in the top five in the league - and you can forget the Champions League."

In recent weeks, Arsene Wenger has signed Everton striker Francis Jeffers and Rangers midfielder Giovanni van Bronckhorst in an attempt to strengthen his squad and persuade Vieira to stay. However, Vieira sees nothing to be excited about in their arrival.

"When I told Arsene Wenger I was leaving, he said to me 'I have £25m to spend on a few players'. My answer was 'Obviously, Mr Wenger, you are not shopping in Harrods. That will only buy you one good player.' Now I have been proved right.

"Arsene Wenger has signed two 'hopeful' players who haven't proved themselves in the Premiership yet. One of them is a boy of 20.

"You can't compete with the best clubs in Europe by making these kind of signings.

"Arsene Wenger is an ambitious manager and he knows deep in his heart that he needs five world-class players to compete among the best in Europe.

£25m in the kitty, Arsenal is not a great European club. With that budget they won't even be among the top 20 clubs in Europe."

Fellow Frenchmen Robert Pires, Thierry Henry, Sylvain Wiltord and Gilles Grimandi have urged Vieira to remain at Highbury, but today he dismissed their pleas.

He declared: "I have given 100 per cent to Arsenal over the last five years. They have only been there for a year or so.

"They have won nothing with Arsenal. They should stay and try to win things for the club before they open their mouths.

"My message to these players is that they have their lives and I have mine."

replies.msg:
路斯基的告別賽將在9/6在布拉格舉行，佢亦公布了相關詳情

屆時兩支隊伍分別是捷克現役國家隊成員及前國腳組成，將會對戰由阿仙奴和多蒙特兩支隊伍組成的現役和前球員。35分鐘為一節，分上下半場進行，路斯基將會分別代表兩隊比賽

路斯基邀請了不少朋友（部分未完全作實參與，但佢本人公布了不少熟悉名字）。捷克隊成員有尼維特、真高拿、贊古奴夫斯基和普波斯基等（當然施治也不例外）；至於阿仙奴多蒙特聯隊則有法比加斯、法明尼，佢亦邀請了韋舒亞、奧斯爾和禾確特；多蒙特方面則提到了紐尼沙軒和戴迪

路斯基特別提到佢好想卡蘇拿到時會在場，即使佢仍未傷癒而不能落場

有記者問路斯基的退役感受，佢答道只會想念當仍是球員的話，在比賽當日在更衣室和比賽場地的一剎那，但其餘日常操練和體能訓練等苦差就不再想做了

當被問到點睇阿仙奴，佢認為雲加的離去必然對球員帶來巨變，不過佢知道球會已逐步籌劃將來的事，佢本人對阿仙奴這個改變相當感興趣。佢不會去猜測新任教練人選，但寄望接手的人將會尊重雲加所帶來的一切價值


傑出阿仙奴 Excellent Arsenal

路斯基的告別賽將在9/6在布拉格舉行，佢亦公布了相關詳情

屆時兩支隊伍分別是捷克現役國家隊成員及前國腳組成，將會對戰由阿仙奴和多蒙特兩支隊伍組成的現役和前球員。35分鐘為一節，分上下半場進行，路斯基將會分別代表兩隊比賽

路斯基邀請了不少朋友（部分未完全作實參與，但佢本人公布了不少熟悉名字）。捷克隊成員有尼維特、真高拿、贊古奴夫斯基和普波斯基等（當然施治也不例外）；至於阿仙奴多蒙特聯隊則有法比加斯、法明尼，佢亦邀請了韋舒亞、奧斯爾和禾確特；多蒙特方面則提到了紐尼沙軒和戴迪

路斯基特別提到佢好想卡蘇拿到時會在場，即使佢仍未傷癒而不能落場

有記者問路斯基的退役感受，佢答道只會想念當仍是球員的話，在比賽當日在更衣室和比賽場地的一剎那，但其餘日常操練和體能訓練等苦差就不再想做了

當被問到點睇阿仙奴，佢認為雲加的離去必然對球員帶來巨變，不過佢知道球會已逐步籌劃將來的事，佢本人對阿仙奴這個改變相當感興趣。佢不會去猜測新任教練人選，但寄望接手的人將會尊重雲加所帶來的一切價值

後雲加時代兵工廠球衣曝光？


【now.com體育】英國報章周二轉載阿仙奴新主場球衣的設計款式，可能是主帥雲加離隊後的第1件兵工廠波衫。

阿仙奴與球衣贊助商「豹牌」的合作關係，將於2019年屆滿。最近有網站洩露「豹牌」為兵工廠設計的2018/19球季主場球衣款式。從圖片所見，這件阿仙奴新波衫仍離不開紅底白袖的傳統，不同的是紅色偏深像紅辣椒般，並配上闊圓領。此外，兩邊衫袖位置，分別加了紅色色塊。

報道指，這件或是短期內最後1件「豹牌」兵工廠球衣，因為球會打算轉跟「一剔」或「三間」合作，換取比現時3000萬鎊1季更高的贊助費；「三間」現時每季贊助曼聯7500萬鎊，「一剔」單季贊助車路士的費用亦達到6000萬鎊。

網上近期亦流傳兵工廠第2作客球衣的款式，新作客波衫的顏色為粉錄，但被網民認為是阿仙奴歷來最差的作客球衣。

圖片來源 : 互聯網
